post:
Zeropid.com offers a wide range of Linux and Windows VPS servers w/ excellent speeds and support. All of our VPS servers are hosted on raid-10 protected storage using OpenVZ and VMware technologies. Users are offered to choose their choice of server location and Operating Systems on checkout. We have 24/7 monitoring system, our technicians are notified automatically in case of service/network issue. Some extra features are:

Features:

  • Powerful Hardware DDos Protection
  • Raid-10 Protected Storages
  • OpenVZ / VMware Virtualizations
  • Dedicated 100MBPS connection (Burst Up to 1GBPS)
  • Unmetered Bandwidth
  • Full Root/SSH/Admin Access
  • IPtable/TUN/TAP/PPTP Enabled
  • Choice of OS, Choice of DC
  • No long contracts, cancel any time
